• Brooke wants Rick to attend the rehearsal dinner and wedding.
• Ridge invites Phoebe to sing at his rehearsal dinner.
• Taylor and Ridge discuss co-parenting and bringing stability to the family.
• Brooke and Rick have a heartfelt conversation, and Rick agrees to attend the wedding.

• Ridge and Brooke argue about her relationship with Nick and his role in their family.

* Nicole asks Brady for help in keeping Mia from meeting her fiancé, and Brady suggests telling Mia the truth about the situation.
* John decides to undergo hypnosis to regain his memories, and Marlena supports him despite her concerns about pushing him too hard.
* Chloe and Daniel struggle with their feelings for each other and the upcoming engagement party, with Daniel urging Chloe to be honest with Lucas.
* Chelsea and Max discuss their complicated relationship and the upcoming engagement party, with Max suggesting he accompany Chelsea to help her feel less alone.

* Abigail is having a tough time dealing with the DiMeras, specifically Chad and EJ. Adrienne brings EJ some of Alex's guitar picks and discovers Jennifer is also having issues with Abigail and the DiMeras.
* Julie is concerned about Nick's absence and asks Abigail to text him to ask him to call her. Abigail reveals she has been seeing EJ and he helped her keep a secret about Nick.
* Kate makes churros for EJ as a thank you for helping keep Abigail's mouth shut about Nick. Eric's computer files are deleted and he suspects Chyka, a cardiologist, is responsible.
* Sami and Kate discuss the situation with Abigail and Nick, as well as Julie's concern for Nick's absence. Sami wants to handle things on their own and Kate agrees.
* Anne files a harassment complaint against Daniel for pushing her, but Jennifer steps in to help and Anne is allowed to leave. Roman and Marlena discuss their failures in the Kristen DiMera situation and Marlena's impact on Eric's beliefs.

* Melanie's father, who has a tremor in his hand and can no longer work, is leaving town to take some time for himself. Melanie is upset about losing him again.
* Gabi reveals that Kate wanted to discuss their future with Chad and Melanie at Countess Wilhelmina, intending to make them the fresh faces of the company.
* Hope and Bo sneak into Stefano's safe deposit box with the help of Carol, the bank employee, who was unaware of their true intentions.
* Stefano receives a call from the bank about a problem with his shared safe deposit box with A. Grayson.
* Victor reveals to Daniel that Maggie is his mother.
* Sonny asks Will about his experience coming out to his parents.
* Madison confesses a secret to someone, but the text does not reveal who it is.

• Belle and Shawn-d try to find a way to tell Philip the truth about their love before he goes to war, considering extending tours of duty.
• Mimi confesses to Rex that she had an abortion without telling him she was pregnant, and he forgives her.
• John becomes increasingly desperate for Marlena's help as his health deteriorates, and she promises to never give up on their relationship.

• EJ goes to the bar and encounters Tad, who offers him an apron and suggests he consider working there if his corporate job doesn't work out. EJ receives a call from Sami, who is having trouble with a distributor in Chicago and can't come home.
• Nick tries to catch up with Abigail, who seems hesitant to spend time with him. He expresses remorse for his past actions and reveals that he has a lead on a job, which could keep him in Salem.
• Theresa and Brady discuss Daniel's feelings for Jennifer and Theresa's desire to help him. Brady reveals that Daniel still has feelings for Jennifer and is not interested in Theresa.
• Daniel and Nicole plan to confront Chyka at his hideout, but Daniel insists that they need a better plan and doesn't want to risk their lives.
• Sami and EJ argue about her handling of a business issue and EJ's role in it. Sami accuses EJ of trying to control her life and EJ accuses her of not trusting him. Sami threatens to leave and EJ lets her go.

• Carly and Vivian have a confrontation in a hidden location, with Carly accusing Vivian of trying to harm Melanie and Vivian denying any wrongdoing.
• Melanie is getting ready for her wedding but feels uneasy about Vivian's presence.
• Maggie stays home on her anniversary instead of attending Melanie's wedding due to feeling sad about Mickey.
• Nathan and Stephanie discuss their upcoming vacation and Nathan mentions that Melanie has not responded to a letter he received from her.
• Victor is confident that Vivian will not harm Melanie and dismisses concerns from Hope and others.
• Stefano tries to convince Lexie to stay and have dinner with him after the wedding, but she refuses due to his past deceit.

• Max was overwhelmed with work at his garage, including three oil changes, a brake job, and a bad transmission. Abby unexpectedly appeared and helped him, revealing that she had left some books in the office and felt bad for abandoning him.
• Chelsea's father, Bo, discovered that she had helped Patrick in the past and kicked her out of the house, believing she was a threat to his family. Hope and Billie tried to convince him to give Chelsea another chance.
• Max confessed to Abby that he had a crush on her when she worked at the garage but didn't pursue it due to their age difference and her friendship with Chelsea.
• Chelsea considered using a new job to make Nick jealous. Steve and E.J. expressed their love and devotion to their significant others.

<summary>
• Lexie and Tek have an affair, and Lexie expresses her guilt and regret to Tek, who insists it's too late to turn back.
• Abe discovers Lexie's infidelity and is devastated.
• Marlena confesses her love for John, but he refuses to leave Alex.
• Victor decides not to reveal the truth about Philip being Claire's father for the time being.
• Belle and Philip confess their feelings for each other, and Mimi reveals the truth to Shawn in a letter.
</summary>

<summary>
• Marlena and John argue about Marlena's relationship with Tony and her carrying a bug-sweeping device. John accuses Marlena of being manipulated by Tony.
• Shawn and Belle discuss their relationship and make a pact to never fight again. They also talk about their parents and their different approaches to privacy.
• Kate and Roman argue about Kate's past and her relationship with Tony. Kate reveals that she used to sell her services for money when she was younger, and Roman expresses his concern.
</summary>

* Lexie and Daniel discuss Kate's unconscious patient, Chelsea, who had a complication from surgery. They agree it may be a complication from the procedure.
* Ava confronts Steve and Kayla, holding them captive and revealing she intends to take Kayla's unborn baby as payback for ruining her life. She also threatens to decide who lives and who dies once the baby is born.

• Stefano informs EJ that Rafe has escaped from the asylum, but later reveals he is dead. EJ seems unconcerned and comments that it's "tidy."
• Bo and Hope find Theo and Ciara, who have been missing. They express relief and gratitude to Rafe for finding them.
• Nicole overhears Vivian talking about a prisoner in the DiMera basement and believes Rafe is the one being held captive.

• Chad helps Kate at the pier and learns that Nicole and EJ are getting divorced. He offers to help her and they share a moment.

• Jack returns from being presumed dead and celebrates Abby's birthday with her and Jennifer.
• Jack reveals that he had a dream where he and Abby were reunited, and they both knew it was real.
• Jennifer forgives Hope for hanging up on her during the car accident.
• Hope is worried about Bo and Billie's disappearance.
• Marlena and John are reunited after being presumed dead.

• Bo and Billie find a clue that leads them to believe Georgia is in trouble.
• Kate is shocked to see Marlena and John alive.
• Brady, Lucas, and Rex go to rescue Philip.
• Hope wonders why every man that Billie meets insists on being her savior.

- Brady and Nicole are confronted by a man working for Deimos, who demands Nicole return her child, Holly.

- Eve admits to Vivian that she was fired by Jack and sued him, but Vivian is skeptical of her intentions.

• Luke, a recovering patient, is visited by his wife Tracy and friend Ernesto. Luke expresses his love for Tracy and promises to take better care of himself.
• Diane receives news that she has been nominated for "Litigator of the Year" and seeks advice from Ric on how to handle the situation.
• A health inspector visits Maxie's coffee house and finds several violations, including a leaky hose on the espresso machine. Spinelli is accused of obtaining unauthorized access to the health department's mainframe and falsifying documents to cover up the issue.

• Sonny and Olivia's son, Dante Falconeri (Dominic), was shot and taken to the hospital. Sonny discovered that Olivia had kept their son's identity a secret from him all these years.
• During the christening ceremony, Dominic was supposed to be present but didn't show up. It was later revealed that he had been arrested by Sonny.
• At the hospital, Sonny asked Robin and Patrick to help care for Dante, as he wanted the best possible care for his son.
• Sonny confessed to the Holy Father that he had unintentionally shot his son and expressed remorse for his actions. He also acknowledged that Dante was a good and brave man, and he respected him.

• Claudia Zacchara and Jason Morgan discuss a potential truce between their families, with Claudia suggesting they work together to bring down Trevor Lansing.
• Sonny Corinthos holds Johnny Zacchara captive in an abandoned psychiatric clinic, believing him to be involved in the disappearance of his son.
• Lulu Spencer discusses her feelings for Johnny with Lucky Spencer, expressing her guilt over his involvement in the text message killings and her confusion about her feelings for him.
• Elizabeth Webber provides Ian Buckingham with Nikolas Cassadine's information and Sam McCall's address, hoping to help him in his search for his missing wife.
• Diego Alcazar holds Sam McCall captive and taunts her about her past mistakes and the deaths of his father and Uncle Luis Alcazar.
• Epiphany Johnson attends a "Go Red for Women" event, where she reflects on her own heart surgery and considers how she can use her experiences to help others.
• Sonny and Trevor Lansing have a confrontation, with Sonny accusing Trevor of being involved in the disappearance of his son and the shooting of Kate Howard.
• Nikolas Cassadine is haunted by memories of Emily Quartermaine's death, as he comes to the realization that Diego Alcazar was the one who killed her.

<summary>
• Johnny wears a Clinton mask while attempting to break into Bernie Abrams' office and is caught by Lucky.
• Maxie admires Johnny and Lucky, but believes their relationship would be disastrous.
• Lucky catches a man in a Clinton mask trying to break into Bernie Abrams' office and is impressed by Johnny's bravery.
• Carly and Jason are concerned about Franco's threats towards their family.
• Sonny is visited by a federal prosecutor, Claire Walsh, who plans to send him to prison with his son's help.
• Carly and Jason discuss the origin of a picture of Franco in Josslyn's christening album.
• Sonny is surprised to see Claire Walsh, a federal prosecutor, in his office.
• Alexis and Diane discuss the ongoing renovations of their offices and the upcoming Sonny trial.
• Dante and Sonny have a heated conversation about Dante's decision to testify against him.
• Michael and Dante discuss their relationship and Michael's desire for Sonny to go to prison.
</summary>

• Todd Manning, played by Roger Howarth, shoots and kills Sonny Corinthos (Maurice Benard), believing it to be his brother Anthony Zacchara, in front of Starr Manning (Kristen Alderson) and Blair Cramer (Kassie DePaiva).
• Maxie Jones (Kirsten Storms) grieves for her cousin Robin Scorpio Drake (Kimberly McCullough), who died in an explosion at the hospital.
• Kate Howard (Kelly Monaco) is confronted by Johnny Zacchara (Brandon Barash), who accuses her of trying to set him up for Sonny's murder.
• Steve Burton (ex-Jason Morgan) is revealed to have pulled the plug on a patient in Memphis, and Olivia Falconeri (Lisa LoCicero) threatens to expose him if he doesn't help her take down Johnny.

* Olivia Jerome, played by Nancy Lee Grahn, is revealed to be alive and holding Alexis hostage, threatening to kill her unless Julian does her bidding.
* Sonny seeks Curtis' help in finding Olivia Jerome after learning she is responsible for Morgan's death and the hospital bombing.

* Michael and Abby had an altercation, and he is accused of attempting to rape her. Abby wants to drop the charges, but Michael is determined to make Brandon pay for his actions.
* Luke is blamed for hitting and killing Jake, a child he had a close relationship with. He feels responsible and guilty, despite it being an accident.
* Suzanne and Theo, grandparents, come to an agreement to raise their grandson together, keeping his existence a secret from his mother, Brenda.

* Carly asks Shawn to stay and protect Josslyn despite Jax's attempts to use information against him, and Shawn agrees.
* Brenda thanks Carly for helping with Alec during Suzanne's arrest and acknowledges Carly's dedication to her daughter.

* Elizabeth and Hayden have a confrontation, with Hayden revealing that she is Hayden Barnes, Rachel Berlin's estranged daughter. Elizabeth accuses Hayden of having something to do with Nikolas' disappearance.
* Nathan confesses to Maxie that he shot someone in the past, revealing a dark secret from his past that he had kept hidden from her.
* Jordan issues a warrant for Jason's arrest for the murder of Nikolas Cassadine.

<summary>

- Nikolas ends his relationship with Rebecca because he can't stop thinking about Emily, his late wife, who is Rebecca's twin.
- Michael refuses to go to physical therapy with Carly, insisting that he doesn't need her to police his every move.
- Olivia and John have a history and Sonny is protective of her, but she is seeing someone else, Johnny Zacchara.
- Claudia asks Johnny to help her get rid of Jason Morgan, who is investigating her involvement in Michael's shooting.
- Rebecca tries to rekindle her relationship with Nikolas, but he is still in love with Emily.
- Andrea, the mayor's wife, is upset about her husband's infidelity and the potential fallout for her and her family.
- Sonny sends Jason and Johnny to deal with some of Zacchara's old lieutenants who are trying to leave the organization.
- Claudia asks Johnny to let Jason be ambushed and killed during this mission to protect her and her unborn child.

</summary>

• Maxie and Georgie are both critically ill in the hospital. Maxie is rejecting a heart transplant from Georgie, but Georgie regains consciousness and asks to see Maxie before she dies.
• Ric confesses to Sonny that he killed Evan, claiming it was self-defense. Sonny and Jason are suspicious and want to know why Ric was at the scene and why he wanted them away. Ric insists he called the cops and wants them to leave before the D.A. frames them for the murder.

* Patrick and Robin discuss taking care of Jake, with Robin expressing concern about Patrick's ability to handle a baby and Patrick expressing frustration with mothers and their feeding habits.
* Carly and Jax discuss the possibility of Carly being pregnant and Jax's desire for them to have a child together.
* Sonny and Kate discuss the need for a pre-nup in their upcoming marriage, with Sonny expressing reluctance and Kate explaining the practicality of the agreement.
* Claudia takes care of a sick Jason and Spinelli, with Jason expressing concern for Spinelli's health and Claudia reassuring him.
* Maxie and Johnny are stuck in an elevator and Maxie expresses her desire to hurt Lulu by getting close to Johnny.
* Scott confronts Johnny about attacking his son and Scott wants Johnny arrested, but Johnny refuses to speak without a lawyer.

• Tracy promises Luke she will help him find Jerry Jacks and keep his promise to his daughter, despite the danger involved.
